pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc

Class RemoteActionsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc.IMCMessage
      • pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc.RemoteActionsRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<IMCMessage>, IMessage

    public class RemoteActionsRequest
extends IMCMessage
    IMC Message Remote Actions Request (304)
    This message is used as query to request for the possible remote
    actions (operation=QUERY and the list is empty in this
    case). The vehicle responds using the same message type
    returning the tuplelist with the pairs: Action,Type
    (operation=REPORT). The type of action can be Axis, Hat or
    Button.
